heading: InterMingle
description: InterMingle is a social-media platform where users can either take quizzes made by the community, or create their own quizzes to share. Challenge yourself, your friends, or anyone else to see who prevails in the battle of smarts! Created with a team of 8 engineers

heading: Catwalk
description: In a team of 4, we've created a product-landing page with components that consist of Product Overview, Related Products & User Outfit, Questions & Answers, and Ratings & Review.

heading: Atelier
description: Atelier is the back-end development for the Catwalk Project. This back-end is responsible for managing server calls between the client and the database, with millions of data entries to mimic real-user traffic.  Additional tools include API testing, ETL procedures, and Docker deployment.

heading: Spotify Clone
description: Replication of the Spotify application, using the Spotify Web API node to pull data from Spotify's database. Created with React and TypeScript.
